solution_line_template: The second competitor can eat {first_hotdogs_per_min} x {second_multiplier} = <<{first_hotdogs_per_min}*{second_multiplier}={second_hotdogs_per_min}>>{second_hotdogs_per_min} hotdogs per minute.
The third competitor can eat {second_hotdogs_per_min} x {third_multiplier} = <<{second_hotdogs_per_min}*{third_multiplier}={third_hotdogs_per_min}>>{third_hotdogs_per_min} hot dogs per minute.
Therefore, the third competitor can eat {third_hotdogs_per_min} x {minutes} = <<{third_hotdogs_per_min}*{minutes}={third_total_hotdogs}>>{third_total_hotdogs} hot dogs after {minutes} minutes.
